entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
